comments:
Description:
The filter of aggregation in crosstab doesn't work[1102]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070813-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a crosstab and specify the grandtotal or subtotal
2, Specify the filter in grandtotal or subtotal's aggregation such as measure["QUANTITYORDERED"]<100
3, Preview

Expected result:
The filter or aggreagtion works well

Actual result:
Warning occurs when preview
Error log:
The binding "QUANTITYORDERED_DATE/year" contains aggregation filter, which is currently not supported for cross tab. 
data.olap.invalidBindingAggrFilterNotSupported ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: The binding "QUANTITYORDERED_DATE/year" contains aggregation filter, which is currently not supported for cross tab. at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.util.OlapQueryUtil.validateBinding(OlapQueryUtil.java:94) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.impl.query.CubeCursorImpl.<init>(CubeCursorImpl.java:65) at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.olap.impl.query.CubeQueryResults.getCubeCursor(CubeQueryResults.java:79) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.CubeResultSet.<init>(CubeResultSet.java:78) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.doExecuteCube(DteDataEngine.java:236) at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine.doExecuteQuery(DteDataEngine.java:122)

traces.message: The binding "QUANTITYORDERED_DATE/year" contains aggregation filter, which is currently not supported for cross tab.
